header.description: Single-record header providing print date and print time as user-supplied parameter values displayed in the report header banner.

rows.description: One row per timestamp record from neuract__PT_TABLE. The first column is the formatted date label; subsequent columns are KG/CM² readings for each of the 31 pressure transmitters.

totals.description: No totals section present in this report.

semantics: print_date and print_time are pass-through parameters injected into the report header at generation time; they are not used as data filters. No date-range filter is encoded in the mapping_override; the pipeline will return all rows from neuract__PT_TABLE ordered by timestamp ascending.
transformations: Read all columns from neuract__PT_TABLE in wide format — no reshape needed.
Derive row_pressure_meter by formatting the timestamp_utc column as DD/MM/YYYY string.
Format all 31 pressure transmitter value columns to 4 decimal places for display.
Note: row_ph_146 maps to catalog column PT_146; the HTML header label PH-146 is a display alias only.
